verbs.description: CHARLESTON , W.Va . ( AP ) — [ARG0: Republican voters] [V: rejected] [ARG1: ex - convict Don Blankenship] [ARGM-LOC: in a West Virginia Senate primary in which he sold himself as " Trumpier than Trump "] but was vigorous
